title: A Deep Dive into the Microsoft (MSFT) and Alphabet (GOOGL) Earnings Charts
text: Are Wall Street analysts bullish heading into these two key tech earnings reports?

title: 3 Growth Tech Stocks to Buy Before Earnings and Hold for Years
text: The episode explores three growth-focused technology stocks set to release their results during the first week of November that investors might want to consider as buy and hold candidates.

title: 5 Technology Stocks To Watch Ahead Of Earnings This Week
text: The week of October 25 is shaping up to be a big one for anyone that holds index funds or has exposure to technology stocks. Five of the largest and most well-known names in the technology space report earnings this week.

title: Microsoft Earnings: What to Look For
text: Microsoft (MSFT) reports Q1 earnings after market close on October 26. Can it reverse the longterm slowdown of Azure's revenue growth?

title: What Makes Microsoft (MSFT) a Good Fit for "Trend Investing"
text: If you are looking for stocks that are well positioned to maintain their recent uptrend, Microsoft (MSFT) could be a great choice. It is one of the several stocks that passed through our "Recent Price Strength" screen.

title: Earnings Previews: Alphabet, AMD, Microsoft
text: Only 14 companies in our watch list reported earnings before markets opened Monday.

title: 4 Earnings I'm Watching This Week
text: These four stocks are hitting different parts of the tech market.

title: 5 Nasdaq Stocks Could Send the Market Soaring -- or Plunging -- This Week
text: These earnings reports will be must-reads for investors.

title: Microsoft says Russian group has targeted hundreds of U.S. networks
text: The Russian-based agency behind last year's massive SolarWinds cyberattack has targeted hundreds more companies and organizations in its latest wave of attacks on U.S.-based computer systems, Microsoft said in a blog post.
